properties.body:
EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
SOUTH AFRICA.
DNC 01, DNC 02.
26 FOOT S/V ELBOW GREASE, ONE PERSON ON BOARD,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO LOST RUDDER IN
34-30.34S 017-10.23E. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO CAPE TOWN RADIO,
PHONE: 272 1551 0747, 272 1551 2617,
E-MAIL: MARITIMERADIO@IXMAIL.CO.ZA.
